sentences.en: Avoid muscle strain by warming up with slow jogging.
sentences.cn: 先慢跑热热身，免得拉伤肌肉。

sentences.en: Buddy’s huge gut strained against the buttons on his shirt.
sentences.cn: 巴迪的大肚子把衬衫纽扣绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: Did you find the job a strain ?
sentences.cn: 你觉得这份工作紧张吗？

sentences.en: different strains of wheat
sentences.cn: 不同品种的小麦

sentences.en: Her voice was so low he had to strain to catch it.
sentences.cn: 她的声音很低，他很费力才听得到。

sentences.en: I couldn’t look after him any more; the strain was too much for me.
sentences.cn: 我不能再照看他了，压力太大。

sentences.en: I had to strain to hear.
sentences.cn: 我不得不使劲去听。

sentences.en: I sometimes find it a strain to be responsible for the mortgage.
sentences.cn: 我有时觉得背负这笔抵押贷款很有压力。

sentences.en: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.cn: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.en: It has placed an almost unendurable strain on their marriage.
sentences.cn: 这给他们的婚姻带来了几乎难以承受的压力。

sentences.en: She was straining to keep her head above the water.
sentences.cn: 她竭尽全力将头露出水面。

sentences.en: She was tired and under great strain.
sentences.cn: 她身心疲惫，压力很大。

sentences.en: Strain the fat off before you serve the soup.
sentences.cn: 在上汤前把里面的油滤掉.

sentences.en: Strain the juice through a piece of gauze or a sieve.
sentences.cn: 用一块纱布或过滤网将果汁过滤一下。

sentences.en: Strain the mixture through a double thickness of muslin or cheesecloth.
sentences.cn: 用双层平纹细布或干酪包布过滤混合料。

sentences.en: Strain the stock and put it back into the pan.
sentences.cn: 滤出原汁，将它放回到平底锅中。

sentences.en: The prison service is already under considerable strain.
sentences.cn: 监狱系统已经承受了巨大的压力。

sentences.en: The rope stood up under the strain of the haul.
sentences.cn: 这绳子经受不住紧拉.

sentences.en: the stresses and strains of police life
sentences.cn: 警察生活的紧张和压力

sentences.en: The whole ship shuddered and trembled at the sudden strain.
sentences.cn: 突然的拉力使得整只船剧烈颤动。

sentences.en: Their marriage is under great strain at the moment.
sentences.cn: 眼下他们的婚姻关系非常紧张。

sentences.en: There was a strain of bitterness in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的声音听起来有些愤愤不平。

sentences.en: These four posts take the strain of the whole structure.
sentences.cn: 这四根柱子承受着整个结构的压力。

sentences.en: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.cn: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

words.tran_cn: 紧张的；勉强的；牵强附会的；滤过的
过滤器；松紧扣；用力拉的人，拉紧者
使紧张（动词strain的过去式和过去分词）
张力；[力]拉紧；负担；[外科]扭伤；血缘

phrases.tran_cn: ◎使劲拉某物；使劲做某事；努力争取
应变速率；应变率；变形速度

trans.tran_cn: 压力，重负，拉力，张力，拉伤，扭伤，个性特点，品系，品种（动植物的）株系，类型；品质；个性特点，禀性，（尤指金钱）过多使用
trans.tran_en: worry that is caused by having to deal with a problem or work too hard over a long period of time
worry that is caused by having to deal with a problem or work too hard over a long period of time

trans.tran_cn: 拉伤，损伤，尽力，使不堪承受，使紧张，拉紧，过滤
trans.tran_en: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard

trans.tran_cn: 拉紧， 绷紧； 扭伤， 拉伤； 过劳， 极度紧张
trans.tran_en: worry that is caused by having to deal with a problem or work too hard over a long period of time

trans.tran_cn: 尽力；用力推， 用力拉
trans.tran_en: to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

trans.tran_cn: 扭伤， 拉伤；拉紧， 扯紧 <
trans.tran_en: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability
